content: TE-Y RD Ground Rod Driver Ground rod driver for driving earth rods using SDS Max (TE-Y) power tools ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Chisels and rod drivers- - - ### FEATURES:Features Better reliability – these ground rod drivers are made from high-alloy steel, essential when you need consistency and reliability Certified quality – developed using ISO certified processes and more than 30 years of expertise in chisel design and production Applications Driving ground rods for electrical circuits into the ground For use with SDS Max (TE-Y) electric jackhammers, breakers or rotary hammers ### TECHNICAL DATA: Connection end: TE-Y (SDS Max) Application: Rod and stake driving Base material: Soil Technical Data | Connection end | TE-Y (SDS Max) | Application | Rod and stake driving | Base material | Soil | Product Class | Premium ### ITEMS- 2316593 - Ground rod driver TE-YX RD 1/2 - Package Size 1 pc - 2429807 - Rod setting tool TE-Y RD 1/2 - Package Size 1 pc - 2316594 - Ground rod driver TE-YX RD 5/8 - Package Size 1 pc - 2429758 - Rod setting tool TE-Y RD 5/8 - Package Size 1 pc - 2429009 - Rod setting tool TE-Y RD 3/4 - Package Size 1 pc - 2316595 - Ground rod driver TE-YX RD 3/4 - Package Size 1 pc - 2316596 - Ground rod driver TE-YX RD 1 - Package Size 1 pc - 2429820 - Rod setting tool TE-Y RD 1 - Package Size 1 pc
